string-array.name: description_parks
string-array.item: Historical park with paths, central fountain and attractions.
Lively Central Park: fountains, expansive lawns and an open-air sculpture museum.

Ataturk Park in Bishkek is a large green space with great walking paths, well tended gardens, memorials and statues to famous Kyrgs including Mustafa Ataturk, the revolutionary and founder of the Republic of Turkey, who the park is named after. There are many people walking and biking through the park so it is great to people watch and interact with some as well, everyone is friendly
